statements: UPDATE components SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE component_id = 1;

UPDATE ComponentInventory JOIN RobotComponents ON ComponentInventory.component_id = RobotComponents.component_id SET ComponentInventory.quantity_in_stock = ComponentInventory.quantity_in_stock - 1 WHERE RobotComponents.component_name = 'Sensor A';
UPDATE RobotAssemblies SET total_components_used = (SELECT SUM(quantity_in_stock) FROM ComponentInventory) WHERE assembly_id = 1;
